description: Highly packable, yet durable and protective enough for serious mountain weather, the Liquid Point Pants feature a clean design and GORE-TEX® PACLITE® shell fabric to achieve that sought-after balance of durable protection and light weight.
name: Black Diamond Liquid Point Pants - Mens

specs.value: Gore-Tex Paclite 2.5 L, 75d plain weave face with PFG-Free DWR finish - 125 g
